title: Miranda (Felisberto de Betencourt)
body: He served as a clerk in the City Council's secretariat, to which he was appointed on November 3, 1835, and he died at the age of over 70 on January 30, 1889, while retired at that time. In the City Council's library, there is a manuscript organized by him with the title: Apontamentos para a genealogia de diversas familias da Madeira, colleccionados de 1887 a 1888.

Felisberto de Betencourt: Served as a clerk in the City Council's secretariat

1835: Felisberto de Betencourt was appointed to the position of clerk in the City Council's secretariat
